entry.title: Awesome Vulkan Updates on Mar 13 - Mar 19, 2023
entry.content:
Tutorial

  • Kohi Game Engine Series - "Vulkan Game Engine series, where we make a game engine from the ground up using C and Vulkan".

Books

entry.summary: 2 awesome projects updated on Mar 13 - Mar 19, 2023

entry.title: Awesome Vulkan Updates on Feb 27 - Mar 05, 2023
entry.content:
Libraries

  • Frameworks, Engines, Higher Level Rendering
    • Acid (⭐1.9k) - A high speed C++17 Vulkan game engine. [MIT]
    • AMD's Anvil (⭐601) - cross-platform framework for Vulkan. [LICENSE (⭐601)]
    • Auto-Vk (⭐294) - Vulkan convenience and productivity layer for modern C++, atop Vulkan-Hpp, by the Research Unit of Computer Graphics, TU Wien. [MIT]
    • Auto-Vk-Toolkit (⭐426) - C++ framework around Auto-Vk (⭐294) for rapid prototyping, research, and teaching, by the Research Unit of Computer Graphics, TU Wien. [MIT for the framework's code]
    • bgfx (⭐16k) - Cross-platform, graphics API agnostic, "Bring Your Own Engine/Framework" style rendering library. [BSD-2-clause (⭐16k)]
    • bsf (⭐1.8k) - Modern C++14 library for the development of real-time graphical applications. [MIT]
    • Cinder (⭐5.4k) and the story behind. [BSD]
    • DemoFramework (⭐315) - NXP GTEC C++11 cross-platform demo framework including lots of samples for Vulkan, OpenGL ES, OpenVX, OpenCL, OpenVG and OpenCV. [BSD-3-clause (⭐315)]
    • Diligent Engine (⭐3.9k) - a modern cross-platform low-level graphics library that supports OpenGL/GLES, Direct3D11/12 and Vulkan. [Apache License 2.0]
    • Falcor (⭐2.9k) - Real-time rendering framework from NVIDIA, supporting mainly DX12, with experimental Vulkan support. [BSD 3-clause]
    • glfw (⭐14k) and the guide. [LICENSE (⭐14k)]
    • Intrinsic Engine (⭐1k) - Intrinsic is a Vulkan based cross-platform graphics and game engine. [Apache License 2.0]
    • Introductory Vulkan sample by GPUOpen (⭐120). [MIT]
    • liblava (⭐834) - A modern C++ and easy-to-use framework. [MIT]
    • Logi (⭐16) - Light-weight object oriented Vulkan abstraction framework. [BSD 2-clause]
    • Lugdunum (⭐246) - Modern cross-platform 3D rendering engine built with Vulkan and modern C++14. [MIT]
    • openFrameworks (⭐65) - the most famouse C++ creative coding framework. [MIT]
    • PowerVR SDK (⭐740) - C++ cross-platform 3D graphics SDK to speed up development of Vulkan and GLES. [LICENSE (⭐740)]
    • Pumex (⭐295) - cross-platform Vulkan renderer implementing frame graph and simple scene graph. Able to render on many surfaces at once [MIT]
    • SDL - added cross-platform Vulkan graphics support in SDL_vulkan.h. [zlib]
    • small3d, Tiny Vulkan based C++ cross-platform game development framework [BSD 3-clause]
    • Spectrum (⭐14) - Work-in-progress framework and abstraction layer around Vulkan.
    • Tephra (⭐38) - A modern C++17 graphics and compute library filling the gap between Vulkan and high-level APIs like OpenGL. [MIT]
    • The-Forge (⭐5.2k) - DirectX 12, Vulkan, macOS Metal 2 rendering framework. [Apache License 2.0]
    • VKFS (⭐10) - Cross-platform easy-to-use C++ framework that allows you to quickly initialize Vulkan and get a ready-made environment. Provides high-level abstraction over basic Vulkan objects.
    • Vulkan Launchpad (⭐76) - Vulkan framework for Windows, macOS, and Linux. Especially well-suited for Vulkan beginners, used in university education, by the Research Unit of Computer Graphics, TU Wien. [MIT]
      • Vulkan Launchpad Starter (⭐24) - Starter template containing additional functionality and assets. [LICENSE] (⭐24)
entry.summary: 1 awesome projects updated on Feb 27 - Mar 05, 2023

    • Direct link to the paper.
    • Pre-recorded presentation on YouTube.

entry.title: Awesome Vulkan Updates on Jul 25 - Jul 31, 2022
entry.content:
Tutorial

  • Vulkan Lecture Series - University lectures by Johannes Unterguggenberger from the Research Unit of Computer Graphics, TU Wien. Covers basic and advanced topics like: Vulkan essentials, the swap chain, resources and descriptors, commands and command buffers, pipelines and stages, real-time ray tracing, and synchronization.

Khronos

  • Specification
    • Vulkan 1.0 Core API (Chunked HTML) (PDF) (Single-file HTML)
    • Vulkan 1.0 Core API + Khronos-defined Extensions (Chunked HTML) (PDF) (Single-file HTML)
    • Vulkan 1.0 Core API + all registered Extensions (Chunked HTML) (PDF) (Single-file HTML)
    • Vulkan 1.1 Core API (Chunked HTML) (PDF) (Single-file HTML)
    • Vulkan 1.1 Core API + Khronos-defined Extensions (Chunked HTML) (PDF) (Single-file HTML)
    • Vulkan 1.1 Core API + all registered Extensions (Chunked HTML) (PDF) (Single-file HTML)
    • Vulkan 1.2 Core API (Chunked HTML) (PDF) (Single-file HTML)
    • Vulkan 1.2 Core API + Khronos-defined Extensions (Chunked HTML) (PDF) (Single-file HTML)
    • Vulkan 1.2 Core API + all registered Extensions (Chunked HTML) (PDF) (Single-file HTML)
    • Vulkan 1.3 Core API (Chunked HTML) (PDF) (Single-file HTML)
    • Vulkan 1.3 Core API + Khronos-defined Extensions (Chunked HTML) (PDF) (Single-file HTML)
    • Vulkan 1.3 Core API + all registered Extensions (Chunked HTML) (PDF) (Single-file HTML)
entry.summary: 2 awesome projects updated on Jul 25 - Jul 31, 2022

entry.title: Awesome Vulkan Updates on Jun 13 - Jun 19, 2022
entry.content:
Libraries

  • Low Level
    • Vulkan Memory Allocator (⭐2.9k) - Easy to integrate Vulkan memory allocation library from AMD. [MIT]
      • [VulkanMemoryAllocator-Hpp] (https://github.com/malte-v/VulkanMemoryAllocator-Hpp (⭐37)) - C++ Bindings for VMA, like Vulkan-HPP
    • Fossilize (⭐35) - serialization format for various persistent Vulkan object types. [MIT]
    • vk-bootstrap (⭐989) - C++ utility library to jump start Vulkan development by automating instance, physical device, device, and swapchain creation. [MIT]
    • Google's vulkan-cpp-library (⭐250) - Vulkan abstraction library using C++11 for memory, resource management, type and thread safety as well as system independency. [Apache]
    • FrameGraph (⭐419) - Vulkan abstraction layer that represent frame as a task graph. [BSD 2-clause]
    • V-EZ (⭐876) - light-weight middleware layer for the Vulkan API targeting Professional Workstation ISVs. [MIT]
    • Vookoo (⭐533) - Vookoo is a set of dependency-free utilities to assist in the construction and updating of Vulkan graphics data structres. [MIT]
    • vpp (⭐263) - Modern C++ Vulkan Abstraction focused on performance and a straightforward interface. [MIT]
    • VulkanSceneGraph - Vulkan/C++17 scene graph project, successor to OpenSceneGraph.
    • Vulkan-WSIWindow (⭐109) - Multi-platform library to create a Vulkan window, and handle input events. [Apache License 2.0]
    • Screen 13 (⭐311) - An easy-to-use Vulkan render graph for Rust. [MIT]
entry.summary: 1 awesome projects updated on Jun 13 - Jun 19, 2022

entry.title: Awesome Vulkan Updates on Apr 26 - May 02, 2021
entry.content:
Libraries

  • Other API Interop and Implementations
    • visor (⭐45) - Vulkan Ignoble Software Rasterizer. [MIT]
    • VulkanOnD3D12 - Vulkan API for D3D12. [Apache License 2.0]
    • rostkatze (⭐83) - C++ implementation of Vulkan sitting on D3D12 🐈[Apache License 2.0]
    • VK9 - Direct3D 9 compatibility layer using Vulkan
    • VUDA (⭐897) - header-only lib that provides a CUDA Runtime API interface. [MIT]
    • clspv (⭐676) - prototype compiler for a subset of OpenCL C to Vulkan compute shaders. [Apache License 2.0]
    • MoltenVK (⭐5.2k) - run Vulkan on iOS and macOS. [Apache-2.0]
    • Zink - OpenGL implementation on top of Vulkan, part of Mesa project. [MIT]
    • glo / OpenGL Overload (⭐278) - OpenGL implementation on top of Vulkan.
    • gfx-portability (⭐389) - Vulkan Portability implementation on Metal and D3D12, based on gfx-rs (⭐5.4k).

Bindings

  • gfx-rs (⭐5.4k) - A low-overhead Vulkan-like GPU API for Rust. [Apache License 2.0]
entry.summary: 2 awesome projects updated on Apr 26 - May 02, 2021

entry.title: Awesome Vulkan Updates on Mar 08 - Mar 14, 2021
entry.content:
Libraries

  • 2D
    • imgui (⭐67k) - Immediate Mode Graphical User interface. [MIT]
    • Skia - Google's 2D graphics library has a Vulkan backend (⭐9.9k), demonstrated in a cross-platform sample application with its own window library (⭐9.9k). [BSD 3-clause] website
    • VKVG (⭐797) - Vulkan 2D graphics library, API follows the same pattern as Cairo graphics lib, but with new functions.
  • Compute
    • libvc (⭐137) - Vulkan Compute for C++. [LICENSE (⭐137)]
    • Vulkan Kompute (⭐2.3k) - Blazing fast and lightweight Vulkan Compute Framework optimized for advanced GPU processing usecases. [Apache License 2.0]
    • ncnn (⭐22k) - High-performance neural network inference framework with Vulkan based GPU inference. [BSD 3-clause]
    • vuh (⭐350) - Vulkan-based C++ GPGPU computing framework. [MIT]
    • VkFFT (⭐1.6k) - Efficient Vulkan FFT library [MPL-2.0 License]
  • Raytracing
    • Quartz (⭐441) - Physically based Vulkan RTX path tracer with a declarative ES7-like scene description language. [LGPL-3.0]
  • Scientific
    • datoviz (⭐699) - High-performance GPU interactive scientific data visualization with Vulkan. [MIT]
    • iMSTK - C++ toolkit for building surgical simulations with Vulkan and VTK backends. [Apache License 2.0]
  • Shaders
    • glslang (⭐3.3k) - Library for compiling glsl to spirv [BSD 3-Clause]
    • SPIRV-Cross (⭐2.2k) - Library for reflection of spirv, simplify the creation of Vulkan pipeline layouts [ Apache-2.0 License]

Bindings

  • VK² (⭐137), Kotlin Wrapper for Vulkan: code expressiveness and safety meet graphic power [Apache License 2.0]
entry.summary: 6 awesome projects updated on Mar 08 - Mar 14, 2021

entry.content:
Hardware Support

    • Mali GPU Best Practices

Document

  • Arm
    • Vulkan Best Practice for Mobile Developers Tutorials (⭐666)
    • Vulkan's Key Features on Arm Architecture
    • Porting a Graphics Engine to the Vulkan API

    • Multi-Threading in Vulkan
    • Mali Vulkan SDK Tutorials and Slides

Samples

  • Vulkan Best Practice for Mobile Developers Samples (⭐666)

Tools

  • Arm Mobile Studio - includes the Arm Graphics Analyzer to trace graphics performance issues easily, and Arm Streamline performance analyzer, for a whole-system view of performance to determine bottlenecks quickly across both the CPU and GPU.
  • Arm - PerfDoc (⭐118) - a validation layer against the Mali Application Developer Best Practices document. [MIT]

entry.title: Awesome Vulkan Updates on Apr 24 - Apr 30, 2017
entry.content:
Document

  • AMD
    • Vulkan barriers explained
    • Vulkan Fast Paths
    • Let Your Game Shine – Optimizing DirectX 12 and Vulkan Performance with AMD CodeXL
    • D3D12 & Vulkan: Lessons Learned
    • Say Hello to a New Rendering API in Town!
    • Vulkan Renderpasses
    • Performance tweets series: Barriers, fences, synchronization
    • Using the Vulkan™ Validation Layers
    • Most common mistakes in Vulkan apps
    • Vulkan Device Memory

Tutorial

  • vulkan-sxs (⭐17) - explain the Vulkan API step by step and vulkan-sync (⭐55) - rephrase Vulkan's requirements on execution dependencies in a more precise form. [MIT]

Tools

  • LoaderAndValidationLayers (⭐411) - from KhronosGroup. [Apache Licence 2.0]

Books

  • Learning Vulkan - by Parminder Singh - Get started with the Vulkan API and its programming techniques using the easy-to-follow examples.
    • Book's Examples (⭐233)
  • Vulkan Cookbook- by Pawel Lapinski - Explores a wide range of graphics programming and GPU compute methods to make the best use of the Vulkan API.
    • Book's Examples (⭐861)
entry.summary: 5 awesome projects updated on Apr 24 - Apr 30, 2017

entry.title: Awesome Vulkan Updates on Dec 19 - Dec 25, 2016
entry.content:
Hardware Support

  • NVIDIA
    • Driver for Desktop
    • Driver for Android
    • Driver for Linux for Tegra (L4T)
  • Intel
    • Open-source Driver
    • Driver for Windows

Document

  • NVIDIA
    • Vulkan Device-Generated Commands
    • Getting Vulkan Ready For VR
    • GPU-Driven Rendering
    • GDC 16 - High-performance, Low-Overhead Rendering with OpenGL and Vulkan
    • GDC 16 - Vulkan and NVIDIA – The Essentials
    • Engaging the Voyage to Vulkan
    • Vulkan Shader Resource Binding
    • Vulkan Memory Management
    • OpenGL like Vulkan
    • Transitioning from OpenGL to Vulkan
    • Siggraph 15 talk - Vulkan on NVIDIA GPUs
  • Intel
    • API without Secrets: Introduction to Vulkan (⭐1.3k) [LICENSE (⭐1.3k)]
      • Part 1: The Beginning
      • Part 2: Swap Chain
      • Part 3: First Triangle
      • Part 4: Vertex Attributes

Tutorial

  • Siggraph
    • An overview of next-generation graphics APIs - covers Vulkan, D3D12 etc.

Samples

  • Google
    • Android port of LunarG samples (⭐526).
    • android tutorials (⭐910).
  • nvpro-samples - NVIDIA DesignWorks Samples. [LICENSE (⭐169)]
    • gl_vk_chopper (⭐209) - Simple vulkan rendering example.
    • gl_vk_threaded_cadscene (⭐169) - OpenGL and Vulkan comparison on rendering a CAD scene using various techniques and the blog about it.
    • gl_vk_bk3dthreaded (⭐86) - Vulkan sample rendering 3D with 'worker-threads'.
    • gl_vk_supersampled (⭐65) - Vulkan sample showing a high quality super-sampled rendering.
  • Vulkan-Forward-Plus-Renderer (⭐683) - VFPR - a Vulkan Forward Plus Renderer. [MIT]
entry.summary: 8 awesome projects updated on Dec 19 - Dec 25, 2016
